# management-v1alpha1_ftp_server (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `metadata` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--metadata))
- `spec` (Attributes) FTPServerSpec defines the desired state of FTPServer (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--spec))

### Optional

- `alarms` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--alarms))
- `api_version` (String)
- `deviations` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--deviations))
- `kind` (String)
- `name` (String) name of the FTPServer
- `namespace` (String) the namespace scope in which to operate
- `status` (Attributes) FTPServerStatus defines the observed state of FTPServer (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--status))

<a id="nestedatt--metadata"></a>
### Nested Schema for `metadata`

Required:

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

Optional:

- `annotations` (Map of String)
- `labels` (Map of String)


<a id="nestedatt--spec"></a>
### Nested Schema for `spec`

Required:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Enable the FTP server.

Optional:

- `router` (String) Router to associate the server with.
- `router_kind` (String) The Kind of the router for the server.
- `router_selector` (List of String) Selects router resources based on the defined Kind.  Applies to DefaultRouter only. Not supported for Router and ManagementRouter.


<a id="nestedatt--alarms"></a>
### Nested Schema for `alarms`

Optional:

- `critical` (Number)
- `major` (Number)
- `minor` (Number)
- `warning` (Number)


<a id="nestedatt--deviations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `deviations`

Optional:

- `count` (Number)


<a id="nestedatt--status"></a>
### Nested Schema for `status`

Optional:

- `down_servers` (Attributes List) List of down FTP servers. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--status--down_servers))
- `health` (Number) Health score of the FTP server.
- `health_score_reason` (String) Reason for the health score.
- `last_change` (String) Indicates when the FTP server last changed state.
- `operational_state` (String) Operational state of the FTP server.

<a id="nestedatt--status--down_servers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `status.down_servers`

Optional:

- `nodes` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--status--down_servers--nodes))
- `router` (String)

<a id="nestedatt--status--down_servers--nodes"></a>
### Nested Schema for `status.down_servers.nodes`

Optional:

- `node_name` (String)
- `operating_system` (String)
